60 namespace joints_interface

69 JointHardwareInterface::JointHardwareInterface(ros::NodeHandle& rootnh, ros::NodeHandle& robot_hwnh,
70  std::shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_interface,
71  std::shared_ptr<can_driver::CanInterfaceCore> can_interface)
72  : _ttl_interface(std::move(ttl_interface)), _can_interface(std::move(can_interface))
73 {
74  ROS_DEBUG("JointHardwareInterface::ctor");
75 
76  // Used to get or initialize motors home position
77  _get_settings_client =
78  robot_hwnh.serviceClient<niryo_robot_database::GetSettings>("/niryo_robot_database/settings/get");
79  _set_settings_client =
80  robot_hwnh.serviceClient<niryo_robot_database::SetSettings>("/niryo_robot_database/settings/set");
81  _get_home_position_service = robot_hwnh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot_joints_interface/get_home_position",
82  &JointHardwareInterface::callbackGetHomePosition, this);
83  _set_home_position_service = robot_hwnh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot_joints_interface/set_home_position",
84  &JointHardwareInterface::callbackSetHomePosition, this);
85  _reset_home_position_service = robot_hwnh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot_joints_interface/reset_home_position",
86  &JointHardwareInterface::callbackResetHomePosition, this);
87 
88  init(rootnh, robot_hwnh);
89 
90  _calibration_manager =
91  std::make_unique<CalibrationManager>(robot_hwnh, _joint_state_list, _ttl_interface, _can_interface);
92 }
93 
98 bool JointHardwareInterface::init(ros::NodeHandle& /*rootnh*/, ros::NodeHandle& robot_hwnh)
99 {
100  bool torque_status{ false };
101 
102  robot_hwnh.getParam("/niryo_robot/hardware_version", _hardware_version);
103  if (_hardware_version == "ned2" || _hardware_version == "ned3pro")
104  torque_status = true;
105  else if (_hardware_version == "ned" || _hardware_version == "one")
106  torque_status = false;
107 
108  size_t nb_joints = 0;
109 
110  // retrieve nb joints with checking that the config param exists for both name and id
111  while (robot_hwnh.hasParam("joint_" + to_string(nb_joints + 1) + "/id") &&
112  robot_hwnh.hasParam("joint_" + to_string(nb_joints + 1) + "/name") &&
113  robot_hwnh.hasParam("joint_" + to_string(nb_joints + 1) + "/type") &&
114  robot_hwnh.hasParam("joint_" + to_string(nb_joints + 1) + "/bus"))
115  nb_joints++;
116 
117  // connect and register joint state interface
118  _joint_state_list.clear();
119  _map_stepper_name.clear();
120  _map_dxl_name.clear();
121 
122  int currentIdStepper = 1;
123  int currentIdDxl = 1;
124 
125  for (size_t j = 0; j < nb_joints; j++)
126  {
127  int joint_id_config = 0;
128  string joint_name;
129  string joint_type;
130  string joint_bus;
131 
132  robot_hwnh.getParam("joint_" + to_string(j + 1) + "/id", joint_id_config);
133  robot_hwnh.getParam("joint_" + to_string(j + 1) + "/name", joint_name);
134  robot_hwnh.getParam("joint_" + to_string(j + 1) + "/type", joint_type);
135  robot_hwnh.getParam("joint_" + to_string(j + 1) + "/bus", joint_bus);
136  HardwareTypeEnum eType = HardwareTypeEnum(joint_type.c_str());
137  BusProtocolEnum eBusProto = BusProtocolEnum(joint_bus.c_str());
138 
139  // gather info in joint states (polymorphic)
140  if (eType == EHardwareType::STEPPER || eType == EHardwareType::NED3PRO_STEPPER ||
141  eType == EHardwareType::FAKE_STEPPER_MOTOR)
142  {
143  // stepper
144  std::string currentNamespace = "steppers/stepper_" + to_string(currentIdStepper);
145 
146  auto stepperState = std::make_shared<StepperMotorState>(joint_name, eType, common::model::EComponentType::JOINT,
147  eBusProto, static_cast<uint8_t>(joint_id_config));
148 
149  if (initStepperState(robot_hwnh, stepperState, currentNamespace))
150  {
151  _joint_state_list.emplace_back(stepperState);
152  _map_stepper_name[stepperState->getId()] = stepperState->getName();
153 
154  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::TTL_READ_ERROR;
155 
156  // Try 3 times
157  for (int tries = 0; tries < 3; tries++)
158  {
159  if (EBusProtocol::CAN == eBusProto)
160  result = _can_interface->addJoint(stepperState);
161  else if (EBusProtocol::TTL == eBusProto)
162  result = _ttl_interface->addJoint(stepperState);
163 
164  // on success, we initialize the joint and go out of loop
165  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result)
166  {
167  result = initHardware(stepperState, torque_status);
168  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result)
169  {
170  ROS_INFO("JointHardwareInterface::init - add stepper joint success");
171  break;
172  }
173 
174  ROS_WARN(
175  "JointHardwareInterface::init - "
176  "initialize stepper joint failure, return : %d. Retrying (%d)...",
177  result, tries);
178  }
179  else
180  {
181  ROS_WARN(
182  "JointHardwareInterface::init - "
183  "add stepper joint failure, return : %d. Retrying (%d)...",
184  result, tries);
185  }
186  }
187 
188  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS != result)
189  {
190  ROS_ERROR("JointHardwareInterface::init - Fail to add joint, return : %d", result);
191  stepperState->setConnectionStatus(false);
192  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
193  }
194  }
195  else
196  {
197  ROS_ERROR("JointHardwareInterface::init - stepper state init failed");
198  }
199 
200  currentIdStepper++;
201  }
202  else if (eType != EHardwareType::UNKNOWN)
203  {
204  // dynamixel
205  std::string currentNamespace = "dynamixels/dxl_" + to_string(currentIdDxl);
206 
207  auto dxlState = std::make_shared<DxlMotorState>(joint_name, eType, common::model::EComponentType::JOINT,
208  static_cast<uint8_t>(joint_id_config));
209 
210  if (initDxlState(robot_hwnh, dxlState, currentNamespace))
211  {
212  _joint_state_list.emplace_back(dxlState);
213  _map_dxl_name[dxlState->getId()] = dxlState->getName();
214 
215  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::TTL_READ_ERROR;
216 
217  // Try 3 times
218  for (int tries = 0; tries < 3; tries++)
219  {
220  if (EBusProtocol::CAN == eBusProto)
221  ROS_ERROR("JointHardwareInterface::init - Dynamixel motors are not available on CAN Bus");
222  else if (EBusProtocol::TTL == eBusProto)
223  result = _ttl_interface->addJoint(dxlState);
224 
225  // on success, we initialize the joint and go out of loop
226  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result)
227  {
228  result = initHardware(dxlState, torque_status);
229  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result)
230  {
231  ROS_INFO("JointHardwareInterface::init - add dxl joint success");
232  break;
233  }
234 
235  ROS_WARN(
236  "JointHardwareInterface::init - "
237  "init dxl joint failure, return : %d. Retrying (%d)...",
238  result, tries);
239  }
240  else
241  {
242  ROS_WARN(
243  "JointHardwareInterface::init - "
244  "add dxl joint failure, return : %d. Retrying (%d)...",
245  result, tries);
246  }
247  }
248 
249  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS != result)
250  {
251  ROS_ERROR("JointHardwareInterface::init - Fail to add joint, return : %d", result);
252  dxlState->setConnectionStatus(false);
253  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
254  }
255  }
256  else
257  {
258  ROS_ERROR("JointHardwareInterface::init - dxl state init failed");
259  }
260 
261  currentIdDxl++;
262  }
263 
264  // register the joints
265  if (j < _joint_state_list.size() && _joint_state_list.at(j))
266  {
267  auto jState = _joint_state_list.at(j);
268  if (jState)
269  {
270  ROS_DEBUG("JointHardwareInterface::initJoints - New Joints config found : %s", jState->str().c_str());
271 
272  hardware_interface::JointStateHandle jStateHandle(jState->getName(), &_joint_state_list.at(j)->pos,
273  &_joint_state_list.at(j)->vel, &_joint_state_list.at(j)->eff);
274 
275  _joint_state_interface.registerHandle(jStateHandle);
276 
277  hardware_interface::JointHandle jPosHandle(_joint_state_interface.getHandle(jState->getName()),
278  &_joint_state_list.at(j)->cmd);
279 
280  _joint_position_interface.registerHandle(jPosHandle);
281  }
282  }
283  } // end for (size_t j = 0; j < nb_joints; j++)
284 
285  // register the interfaces
286  registerInterface(&_joint_state_interface);
287  registerInterface(&_joint_position_interface);
288 
289  return true;
290 }
291 
296 void JointHardwareInterface::updateJointsHomePosition()
297 {
298  // Check if a custom home position is already cached
299  if (!_cached_custom_home_positions)
300  {
301  // Else try to fetch home position from database
302  if (_get_settings_client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(5.0)))
303  {
304  std::vector<float> tmp_custom_home_positions;
305  for (auto& jState : _joint_state_list)
306  {
307  auto get_request = niryo_robot_database::GetSettings();
308  auto setting_name = "custom_home_position_" + jState->getName();
309  get_request.request.name = setting_name;
310  if (_get_settings_client.call(get_request) &&
311  get_request.response.status == niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS &&
312  !get_request.response.value.empty())
313  {
314  tmp_custom_home_positions.push_back(std::stof(get_request.response.value));
315  }
316  }
317 
318  // Check if all joints have a valid custom home position in database
319  if (tmp_custom_home_positions.size() == _joint_state_list.size())
320  {
321  int counter = 0;
322  for (auto& jState : _joint_state_list)
323  {
324  jState->setHomePosition(tmp_custom_home_positions[counter]);
325  counter++;
326  }
327 
328  _cached_custom_home_positions = true;
329  }
330  }
331  }
332 }
333 
334 bool JointHardwareInterface::callbackGetHomePosition(niryo_robot_msgs::GetFloatList::Request&,
335  niryo_robot_msgs::GetFloatList::Response& res)
336 {
337  ROS_DEBUG("JointHardwareInterface::callbackGetHomePosition - Get home position requested");
338 
339  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
340  res.message = "Home positions retrieved successfully";
341 
342  updateJointsHomePosition();
343 
344  for (auto& jState : _joint_state_list)
345  {
346  res.values.push_back(jState->getHomePosition());
347  }
348 
349  return true;
350 }
351 
352 bool JointHardwareInterface::callbackSetHomePosition(niryo_robot_msgs::SetFloatList::Request& req,
353  niryo_robot_msgs::SetFloatList::Response& res)
354 {
355  ROS_DEBUG("JointHardwareInterface::callbackSetHomePosition - Set new home position requested");
356 
357  niryo_robot_database::SetSettings set_service = niryo_robot_database::SetSettings();
358 
359  // Check if requested home position values match the joints number
360  if (req.values.size() != _joint_state_list.size())
361  {
362  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
363  res.message = "Failed to set home positions : " + std::to_string(_joint_state_list.size()) +
364  " values required for home positions.";
365  return true;
366  }
367 
368  // Check if requested home positions are in valid ranges
369  std::string out_of_range_positions = "";
370  for (size_t i = 0; i < req.values.size(); ++i)
371  {
372  if (!_joint_state_list[i]->isValidPosition(req.values[i]))
373  {
374  out_of_range_positions += _joint_state_list[i]->getName() + " ";
375  }
376  }
377  if (!out_of_range_positions.empty())
378  {
379  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
380  res.message =
381  "Failed to set home positions : home position for axis (" + out_of_range_positions + ") are out of range.";
382  return true;
383  }
384 
385  int counter = 0;
386  std::vector<float> tmp_custom_home_positions;
387  for (auto& jState : _joint_state_list)
388  {
389  set_service.request.name = "custom_home_position_" + jState->getName();
390  set_service.request.type = "float";
391  set_service.request.value = std::to_string(req.values[counter]);
392  if (_set_settings_client.call(set_service))
393  {
394  if (set_service.response.status == niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS)
395  {
396  jState->setHomePosition(req.values[counter]);
397  }
398  else
399  {
400  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
401  res.message = "Failed to set home position in db for axis " + jState->getName();
402  return true;
403  }
404  }
405  else
406  {
407  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
408  res.message = "Failed to call service /niryo_robot_database/settings/set";
409  return true;
410  }
411 
412  counter++;
413  }
414 
415  _cached_custom_home_positions = true;
416 
417  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
418  res.message = "Home positions set successfully";
419 
420  return true;
421 }
422 
423 bool JointHardwareInterface::callbackResetHomePosition(niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Request&,
424  niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger::Response& res)
425 {
426  ROS_DEBUG("JointHardwareInterface::callbackResetHomePosition - Reset home position requested");
427 
428  auto set_service = niryo_robot_database::SetSettings();
429 
430  for (size_t i = 0; i < _joint_state_list.size(); ++i)
431  {
432  auto& jState = _joint_state_list[i];
433  set_service.request.name = "custom_home_position_" + jState->getName();
434  set_service.request.type = "float";
435  set_service.request.value = "";
436  _set_settings_client.call(set_service);
437 
438  jState->resetHomePosition();
439  }
440 
441  _cached_custom_home_positions = false;
442 
443  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
444  res.message = "Home positions reset to default values";
445  return true;
446 }
447 
455 bool JointHardwareInterface::initStepperState(ros::NodeHandle& robot_hwnh,
456  const std::shared_ptr<StepperMotorState>& stepperState,
457  const std::string& currentNamespace) const
458 {
459  bool res = false;
460  if (stepperState)
461  {
462  double offsetPos = 0.0;
463  double gear_ratio = 1.0;
464  int direction = 1;
465  double max_effort = 0.0;
466  double default_home_position = 0.0;
467  double limit_position_min = 0.0;
468  double limit_position_max = 0.0;
469  double motor_ratio = 0.0;
470  int torque_percentage = 0;
471 
472  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/offset_position", offsetPos);
473  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/gear_ratio", gear_ratio);
474  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/direction", direction);
475  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/max_effort", max_effort);
476  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/default_home_position", default_home_position);
477  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/limit_position_min", limit_position_min);
478  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/limit_position_max", limit_position_max);
479  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/motor_ratio", motor_ratio);
480  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/torque_percentage", torque_percentage);
481 
482  // acceleration and velocity profiles (with conversion from RPM and RPM-2)
483  common::model::VelocityProfile profile{};
484  double data{};
485  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_start"))
486  {
487  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_start", data);
488  // v in 0.01 RPM
489  profile.v_start = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
490  }
491  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/a_1"))
492  {
493  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/a_1", data);
494  profile.a_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
495  }
496  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_1"))
497  {
498  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_1", data);
499  profile.v_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
500  }
501  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/a_max"))
502  {
503  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/a_max", data);
504  if ("ned3pro" == _hardware_version)
505  profile.a_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ / 214.577);
506  else
507  profile.a_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
508  }
509  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_max"))
510  {
511  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_max", data);
512  if ("ned3pro" == _hardware_version)
513  profile.v_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 1000);
514  else
515  profile.v_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
516  }
517  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/d_max"))
518  {
519  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/d_max", data);
520  profile.d_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
521  }
522  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/d_1"))
523  {
524  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/d_1", data);
525  profile.d_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
526  }
527  if (robot_hwnh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_stop"))
528  {
529  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_stop", data);
530  profile.v_stop = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
531  }
532 
533  // add parameters
534  stepperState->setDefaultHomePosition(default_home_position);
535  stepperState->setOffsetPosition(offsetPos);
536  stepperState->setGearRatio(gear_ratio);
537  stepperState->setDirection(static_cast<int8_t>(direction));
538  stepperState->setMaxEffort(max_effort);
539  stepperState->setVelocityProfile(profile);
540  stepperState->setLimitPositionMax(limit_position_max);
541  stepperState->setLimitPositionMin(limit_position_min);
542  stepperState->setMotorRatio(motor_ratio);
543  stepperState->setTorquePercentage(torque_percentage);
544 
545  // update ratio used to convert rad to pos motor
546  stepperState->updateMultiplierRatio();
547 
548  res = true;
549  }
550  return res;
551 }
552 
560 bool JointHardwareInterface::initDxlState(ros::NodeHandle& robot_hwnh, const std::shared_ptr<DxlMotorState>& dxlState,
561  const std::string& currentNamespace) const
562 {
563  bool res = false;
564  if (dxlState)
565  {
566  double offsetPos = 0.0;
567  double default_home_position = 0.0;
568  int direction = 1;
569  int positionPGain = 0;
570  int positionIGain = 0;
571  int positionDGain = 0;
572  int velocityPGain = 0;
573  int velocityIGain = 0;
574  int FF1Gain = 0;
575  int FF2Gain = 0;
576  int velocityProfile = 0;
577  int accelerationProfile = 0;
578  double limit_position_min = 0.0;
579  double limit_position_max = 0.0;
580 
581  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/offset_position", offsetPos);
582  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/direction", direction);
583 
584  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/position_P_gain", positionPGain);
585  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/position_I_gain", positionIGain);
586  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/position_D_gain", positionDGain);
587 
588  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/velocity_P_gain", velocityPGain);
589  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/velocity_I_gain", velocityIGain);
590 
591  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/FF1_gain", FF1Gain);
592  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/FF2_gain", FF2Gain);
593 
594  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/velocity_profile", velocityProfile);
595  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/acceleration_profile", accelerationProfile);
596 
597  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/default_home_position", default_home_position);
598  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/limit_position_min", limit_position_min);
599  robot_hwnh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/limit_position_max", limit_position_max);
600 
601  dxlState->setOffsetPosition(offsetPos);
602  dxlState->setDirection(static_cast<int8_t>(direction));
603  dxlState->setDefaultHomePosition(default_home_position);
604 
605  dxlState->setPositionPGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(positionPGain));
606  dxlState->setPositionIGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(positionIGain));
607  dxlState->setPositionDGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(positionDGain));
608 
609  dxlState->setVelocityPGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(velocityPGain));
610  dxlState->setVelocityIGain(static_cast<uint32_t>(velocityIGain));
611 
612  dxlState->setFF1Gain(static_cast<uint32_t>(FF1Gain));
613  dxlState->setFF2Gain(static_cast<uint32_t>(FF2Gain));
614 
615  dxlState->setVelProfile(static_cast<uint32_t>(velocityProfile));
616  dxlState->setAccProfile(static_cast<uint32_t>(accelerationProfile));
617 
618  dxlState->setLimitPositionMin(limit_position_min);
619  dxlState->setLimitPositionMax(limit_position_max);
620 
621  res = true;
622  }
623 
624  return res;
625 }
626 
631 void JointHardwareInterface::read(const ros::Time& /*time*/, const ros::Duration& /*period*/)
632 {
633  for (auto& jState : _joint_state_list)
634  {
635  if (jState && jState->isValid())
636  {
637  jState->pos = jState->to_rad_pos(jState->getPosition());
638  // jState->vel = jState->to_rad_vel(jState->getVelocity());
639  }
640  }
641 
642  if (!needCalibration() &&
643  ((_can_interface && !_can_interface->isConnectionOk()) || (_ttl_interface && !_ttl_interface->isConnectionOk())))
644  this->setNeedCalibration();
645 }
646 
651 void JointHardwareInterface::write(const ros::Time& /*time*/, const ros::Duration& /*period*/)
652 {
653  std::vector<std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>> can_cmd;
654  std::vector<std::pair<uint8_t, uint32_t>> ttl_cmd;
655 
656  for (auto const& jState : _joint_state_list)
657  {
658  if (jState && jState->isValid())
659  {
660  if (jState->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::CAN)
661  can_cmd.emplace_back(jState->getId(), jState->to_motor_pos(jState->cmd));
662  if (jState->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::TTL)
663  ttl_cmd.emplace_back(jState->getId(), jState->to_motor_pos(jState->cmd));
664  }
665  }
666 
667  if (_can_interface)
668  _can_interface->setTrajectoryControllerCommands(std::move(can_cmd));
669 
670  if (_ttl_interface)
671  _ttl_interface->setTrajectoryControllerCommands(std::move(ttl_cmd));
672 }
673 
677 void JointHardwareInterface::setCommandToCurrentPosition()
678 {
679  ROS_DEBUG("Joints Hardware Interface - Set command to current position called");
680  for (auto const& jState : _joint_state_list)
681  {
682  if (jState)
683  _joint_position_interface.getHandle(jState->getName()).setCommand(jState->pos);
684  }
685 }
686 
691 bool JointHardwareInterface::needCalibration() const
692 {
693  return (EStepperCalibrationStatus::OK != _calibration_manager->getCalibrationStatus() &&
694  EStepperCalibrationStatus::IN_PROGRESS != _calibration_manager->getCalibrationStatus());
695 }
696 
701 bool JointHardwareInterface::isCalibrationInProgress() const
702 {
703  return (EStepperCalibrationStatus::IN_PROGRESS == _calibration_manager->getCalibrationStatus());
704 }
705 
711 bool JointHardwareInterface::rebootAll(bool torque_on)
712 {
713  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
714 
715  bool res = true;
716  for (auto const& jState : _joint_state_list)
717  {
718  if (jState->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::TTL)
719  {
720  // first set torque state
721  if (jState->isStepper())
722  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
723  std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, jState->getId(),
724  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{ jState->getTorquePercentage() }));
725 
726  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep();
727 
728  if (_ttl_interface->rebootHardware(jState))
729  {
730  initHardware(jState, torque_on);
731  }
732  else
733  {
734  ROS_ERROR("JointHardwareInterface::init - Fail to reboot motor id %d", jState->getId());
735  res = false;
736  }
737  }
738  // reboot not available for CAN
739  }
740 
741  // reset learning mode correctly
742  activateLearningMode(!torque_on);
743 
744  return res;
745 }
746 
753 int JointHardwareInterface::initHardware(const std::shared_ptr<common::model::JointState>& motor_state, bool torque_on)
754 {
755  ROS_DEBUG("TtlInterfaceCore::initHardware");
756 
757  if (motor_state)
758  {
759  if (motor_state->isStepper())
760  {
761  auto stepperState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<common::model::StepperMotorState>(motor_state);
762  if (stepperState)
763  {
764  if (motor_state->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::CAN)
765  {
766  // CMD_TYPE_MICRO_STEPS cmd
767  StepperSingleCmd cmd_micro(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_MICRO_STEPS, motor_state->getId(),
768  { static_cast<int32_t>(stepperState->getMicroSteps()) });
769  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(cmd_micro));
770  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
771 
772  // CMD_TYPE_MAX_EFFORT cmd
773  StepperSingleCmd cmd_max_effort(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_MAX_EFFORT, motor_state->getId(),
774  { static_cast<int32_t>(stepperState->getMaxEffort()) });
775  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(cmd_max_effort));
776  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
777  }
778  else if (motor_state->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::TTL)
779  {
780  // CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE cmd
781  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(
782  EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE, stepperState->getId(),
783  stepperState->getVelocityProfile().to_list()));
784  // TORQUE cmd
785  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(
786  EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, stepperState->getId(),
787  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{ stepperState->getTorquePercentage() }));
788  }
789  }
790  }
791  else if (motor_state->isDynamixel())
792  {
793  auto dxlState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<common::model::DxlMotorState>(motor_state);
794  if (dxlState)
795  {
796  // TORQUE cmd off to ensure command can be written on the motor
797  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(
798  DxlSingleCmd(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, dxlState->getId(), { false })));
799 
800  // set PID
801  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(
802  EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_PID, dxlState->getId(),
803  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>(
804  { dxlState->getPositionPGain(), dxlState->getPositionIGain(), dxlState->getPositionDGain(),
805  dxlState->getVelocityPGain(), dxlState->getVelocityIGain(), dxlState->getFF1Gain(),
806  dxlState->getFF2Gain(), dxlState->getVelProfile(), dxlState->getAccProfile() })));
807  // set velocity and acceleration profile
808  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(
809  EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_PROFILE, dxlState->getId(),
810  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>({ dxlState->getVelProfile(), dxlState->getAccProfile() })));
811 
812  // set startup configuration so that torque is on when motor is alimented
813  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(
814  EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_STARTUP, dxlState->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>({ 1 })));
815 
816  // TORQUE cmd on if ned2, off otherwise
817  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSingleCmd>(
818  DxlSingleCmd(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, dxlState->getId(), { torque_on })));
819  }
820  }
821  }
822  else
823  {
824  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
825  }
826 
827  // wait for empty cmd queue (all init cmd processed correctly)
828  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
829 
830  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
831 }
832 
839 int JointHardwareInterface::calibrateJoints(int mode, string& result_message)
840 {
841  result_message.clear();
842  int calib_res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::ABORTED;
843 
844  if (!isCalibrationInProgress())
845  {
846  if (needCalibration())
847  {
848  // 0. Fetch home position to make sure it is up to date before performing calibration
849  updateJointsHomePosition();
850 
851  // 1. change status in interfaces (needed to trigger lights and sound at startup)
852  if (_can_interface)
853  _can_interface->startCalibration();
854  else
855  _ttl_interface->startCalibration();
856 
857  // sleep for 2 seconds, waiting for light and sound
858  ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
859 
860  calib_res = _calibration_manager->startCalibration(mode, result_message);
861  }
862  else
863  {
864  result_message = "JointHardwareInterface::calibrateJoints - Calibration already done";
865  calib_res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
866  }
867  }
868  else
869  {
870  result_message = "JointHardwareInterface::calibrateJoints - Calibration already in process";
871  }
872 
873  return calib_res;
874 }
875 
882 int JointHardwareInterface::factoryCalibrateJoints(FactoryCalibration::Request::_command_type command,
883  FactoryCalibration::Request::_ids_type ids, string& result_message)
884 {
885  if (FactoryCalibration::Request::START == command)
886  {
887  // 1. change status in interfaces (needed to trigger lights and sound at startup)
888  _ttl_interface->startCalibration();
889 
890  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Calibration started";
891  return _calibration_manager->startFactoryCalibration(command, ids, result_message);
892  }
893 
894  if (FactoryCalibration::Request::STOP == command)
895  {
896  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Calibration done";
897  return _calibration_manager->startFactoryCalibration(command, ids, result_message);
898  }
899 
900  result_message =
901  std::string("JointHardwareInterface::factoryCalibrateJoints - Command not available: " + std::to_string(command));
902  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::ABORTED;
903 }
904 
908 void JointHardwareInterface::setNeedCalibration()
909 {
910  if (_can_interface)
911  _can_interface->resetCalibration();
912  else
913  _ttl_interface->resetCalibration();
914 }
915 
919 void JointHardwareInterface::activateLearningMode(bool activated)
920 {
921  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
922 
923  ROS_DEBUG("JointHardwareInterface::activateLearningMode - activate learning mode");
924 
925  DxlSyncCmd dxl_cmd(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_LEARNING_MODE);
926  StepperTtlSyncCmd stepper_ttl_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE);
927 
928  for (auto const& jState : _joint_state_list)
929  {
930  if (jState)
931  {
932  if (jState->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::TTL)
933  {
934  if (jState->isDynamixel())
935  dxl_cmd.addMotorParam(jState->getHardwareType(), jState->getId(), activated);
936  else
937  stepper_ttl_cmd.addMotorParam(jState->getHardwareType(), jState->getId(),
938  activated ? 0 : jState->getTorquePercentage());
939  }
940  else
941  {
942  StepperSingleCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_LEARNING_MODE);
943 
944  stepper_cmd.setId(jState->getId());
945  stepper_cmd.setParams({ activated });
946  if (_can_interface)
947  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(stepper_cmd));
948  }
949  }
950  }
951 
952  if (_ttl_interface)
953  {
954  if (dxl_cmd.isValid())
955  _ttl_interface->addSyncCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSyncCmd>(dxl_cmd));
956 
957  if (stepper_ttl_cmd.isValid())
958  _ttl_interface->addSyncCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSyncCmd>(stepper_ttl_cmd));
959  }
960 }
961 
966 void JointHardwareInterface::synchronizeMotors(bool synchronize)
967 {
968  ROS_DEBUG("JointHardwareInterface::synchronizeMotors");
969 
970  for (auto const& jState : _joint_state_list)
971  {
972  if (jState && jState->isValid() && jState->isStepper() && jState->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::CAN)
973  {
974  StepperSingleCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_SYNCHRONIZE, jState->getId(), { synchronize });
975  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(stepper_cmd));
976  }
977  }
978 }
